title: Andy & Blessing Play Resident Evil 7 For the FIRST TIME! - Highlights #10
description:
Blessing and Andy are very happy to be playing Resident Evil 7 on stream and not at all resentful. Will they scream? Yes. Will they have a good time? Debatable. 

Find the full stream over at https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKkqbQEzLga5DPQOp6_2Igw

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Andy - http://www.twitter.com/TheAndyCortez
Roger - http://www.twitter.com/rogformer
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids
